Patent Information.Abstract: A novel class of peptides having antimicrobial activity is provided. Also provided are methods for inhibiting the growth of bacteria utilizing the peptides of the invention. Pharmaceutical compositions comprising the novel class of peptides are also provided.

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Gram-negative bacteria:Pseudomonas aeruginosa (MIC=16 µg/ml), Escherichia coli (MIC=4 µg/ml), Salmonella typhimurium (MIC=16 µg/ml);Gram-positive bacteria:Staphylococcus aureus (MIC=4 µg/ml), Staphylococcus epidermidis (MIC=4 µg/ml), Enterococcus faecalis (MIC=8 µg/ml).Yeast:Candida albicans (MIC=16 µg/ml).
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Function: 8-mer substituted peptide that showes broad spectrum activity against bacteria and the yeast C. albicans.

Literature.Title: High-throughput generation of small antibacterial peptides with improved activity.
Literature.Author: Hilpert K, Volkmer-Engert R, Walter T, Hancock RE.

Literature.Title: A Head-to-Head Comparison of the Antimicrobial Activities of 30 Ultra-Short Antimicrobial Peptides Against Staphylococcus aureus, Pseudomonas aeruginosa and Candida albicans
Literature.Author: Lau QY, Choo XY, Lim ZX, Kong Xn, ng FM, Ang M, Hill J, Chia CS
